docs: How to prepare my rental file

s0.title: Build a concrete rental file to find the accommodation of your dreams
s0.text: DossierFacile helps you build a high-quality digital rental
s0.text2: file to ensure you have the best possible results.

s1.h1: Stand out thanks to a quality file
s1.p1: Send owners a clear, complete and coherent file to maximize your chances.
s1.h2: Be the first to respond to an ad
s1.p2: Be the most responsive by sending your digital file with one click.
s1.p3: After a battery of tests by our operators, your file is certified by the State.

s2.title: Build your rental file in three steps
s2.p1: DossierFacile asks you for the necessary documents and just those!
s2.p2: Our agents check your file and help you correct it if necessary.
s2.h3: My file is ready to be sent
s2.p3: Your secure file as a URL link or in PDF format is ready to be sent to the owners.

s3.title: Protect your personal information
s3.text1: With DossierFacile, no more identity papers scattered around the countryside!
s3.text2: Your documents are covered with watermarks to protect you against fraud by unscrupulous owners.
s3.text3: You can configure the opening of your folder link: you can delete it at any time!
s3.link: Learn more about data security at DossierFacile

s4.t1: Karim's file immediately stood out: it was the only file received that was complete!
s4.t2: Simple, efficient and practical: it saved me a lot of time in my apartment search.
s4.t3: I never managed to visit an apartment with my foreign file. With DossierFacile, I finally had more visits!

title: Statistics
